sources.title: It's A Bet
sources.description: A young English reporter makes a bet with a wealthy publisher that he can disappear for a month. In his absence the publisher makes much of the mysterious disappearance in an attempt to boost the circulation of his newspaper.

metadata.Plot: A young English reporter makes a bet with a wealthy publisher that he can disappear for a month. In his absence the publisher makes much of the mysterious disappearance in an attempt to boost the circulation of his newspaper.
metadata.Writer: Marcus McGill, Frank Miller, L. du Garde Peach
metadata.Actors: Gene Gerrard, Helen Chandler, Judy Kelly
